title: Fluctuation and huge drops in Frame rate since last few pathches
body:
since the last few patches I am facing huge fluctuation and drops in frame rate. Earlier i used to play game at a constant FPS of 60 now the game starts around 100 fps and goes down to 30 in no time. it goes to 15-20 in team fights.  I tried reinstalling the game, playing at minimum settings, did everything asked in connection support. My PING count is same as to when I was able to play the game normally. I have updated my drivers and ran the repair tool too. almost tried every solution suggested on the support and forums but still the same problem. 
Please help.

replies.body:
There could be some bad game files not properly rendering some game files, and causing frame drops during some pivotal moments like that.  I don't think that this would be a connection issue in this case.  What specifically did you run on the Hextech Repair Tool?

To help rule out some possibilities, you'll want to go over the [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide instead.  This will also help tune up anything else that can cause these frame drops.  Let me know if you have any questions about this!
If he reinstalled the game, wouldn't that eliminate the bad game files theory? Unless the reinstall can corrupt on install or something..
I installed the game. Formatter my hard drive. Changed my os. I have done everything . I dont know what is happening.

Thanks for trying all those steps out, though it really sucks that it hasn't seemed to help.  At this point, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work with you individually towards a fix.  Attach the logs from the HRT as well to give us more context.  We'll see you there!

On the hextech repair tool i didnt do much,  just clicked on run. The options selected were:
General- Run ping test, sync system clock, gather system and lol log.
Dns- only check option was Add firewall exceptions. Also this proplem is prior to me using hextech repair tool. It came with a patch. 
 
Also I have already tried every single thing mentions in FPS ISSUES, NO HELP.
 Please give a solution, its been very bad last few weeks.
Also my computer specs are upto the requirements and my friends having worse specs are not having issues.
